October 9$ 1952
Dr. Prank P. Graham
U. S. Representative to the U. H.
United Nations Assembly
New York, N. Y.
Dear Doctor Graham:
The National Association of Educational
Broadcasters is seeking a new Executive Director. The
name of Mr. Early Wynn, Communications Center, University
of North Carolina, has been suggested to us.
The person we seek is one interested in educationâ€”
in educational radio and television, one who has administrative
ability, personality, imagination, and proven leadership.
For the special committee considering the possible
candidates, would you be kind enough to give us your
impressions and evaluations of Mr. Wynn for the position.
For your information, I might explain that NAEB
is an association of practically all educational radio and
television stations in the USA.
Your kindness will be appreciated.
Sincerely yours,
FES s f mh
Frank E. Schooley
Treasurer
